{"id":572194307,"lang":"java","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1634403607,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/572194307/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"38.7 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    public String addStrings(String num1, String num2) {\n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        int carry = 0;\n        for(int i = num1.length() - 1, j = num2.length() - 1; i >= 0 || j >= 0 || carry == 1; i--, j--){\n            int x = i < 0 ? 0 : num1.charAt(i) - '0';\n            int y = j < 0 ? 0 : num2.charAt(j) - '0';\n            sb.append((x + y + carry) % 10);\n            carry = (x + y + carry) / 10;\n        }\n        return sb.reverse().toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
